meta.description: Overweight Farming is a small mod that aims to improve and expand Minecraft's farming and tries to make farming more fun. The prime feature of this mod is the overweight crop which has a very small chance for a vanilla crop to grow into one of these.
meta.long_description:
![First screenshot](https://i.imgur.com/1CGxas2.png)
# üìò: General Overview

Overweight Farming is a small mod that aims to improve and expand Minecraft's farming and tries to make farming more fun. The prime feature of this mod is the overweight crop which has a very small chance for a vanilla crop to grow into one of these. 

[![akliz ad](https://i.imgur.com/aD9X866.png)](https://www.akliz.net/galena)
![second screenshot](https://i.imgur.com/uafwrgf.png)
### Overweight Farming is a really small mod that focuses on deepening and expanding farming in Minecraft. It's named after the first feature we added, the Overweight Crops!

![third screenshot](https://i.imgur.com/L3BVBqd.png)
### Beets, carrots, potatoes, or beans have a small chance to grow into Overweight Crops. Breaking them results in a higher yield than regular crops.

![fourth screenshot](https://i.imgur.com/vQEMMqS.png)
### During Moonlight, crops have an increased chance to grow into Overweight Crops.

# üì¶: The Straw Hat 
![first straw hat](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/942654912054063104/962321997847756830/unknown.png)

### The Straw Hat is a new item sold by farmers. Aside from making you look like a proper farmer, this hat increase the chance of Overweight Crops growing, and allows animals to have doublets or triplets when breeding.

![second straw hat](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/942654912054063104/962322031276347482/unknown.png)

# üì¶: Apeeling Update 
![first apeeling update screenshot](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/bCxmmxKN/images/1190d403d4da40ca2a5e1c75f2036425c75a061e.png)

![second apeeling update screenshot](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/bCxmmxKN/images/2bb05efc6791bb6efd92485b581c7459d0ed7758.png)
### You can now peel all overweight crops using an axe!

### When peeled, they drop a new item: Vegetable Peels.

![third apeeling update screenshot](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/bCxmmxKN/images/8fc8d5463ba2586ce608a9b976736506c15880b0.png)
### You can remove the seeds from peeled melons by right-clicking them.

### They can also be waxed to prevent people from steeling your melon seeds.

![fourth apeeling update screenshot](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/bCxmmxKN/images/e21c373268bcad309ef67daa42aa12c1dbcb0b6d.png)
### Right-clicking a peeled melon with an empty bottle gives you melon juice!

 ![fifth apeeling update screenshot](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/bCxmmxKN/images/e96a3f1e11623ec67b5b805fde732e487183349c.png)
### Vegetable peels can be fed to pigs, and make for good compost.

### They also have a storage block variant, which is great for decoration: The Vegetable Compost.

![sixth apeeling update screenshot](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/bCxmmxKN/images/ab8ea8cfed36d9ec355bf60fe666087916ef73c6.png)
### You can also finally obtain overweight poisonous potatoes by baking an overweight potato on a heat source!

# üì¶: Garnish Update 
![first garnish update screenshot](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/bCxmmxKN/images/dc0a9a0ff8d96b8ea487a436ef27d04c245fe286.png)

![second garnish update screenshot](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/bCxmmxKN/images/c673df39a4c9937efe610b8418314761b1cb006b.png)
### Overweight Apples now have a small chance to generate on big oak trees. Be careful though, or they might fall on your head!

![third garnish update screenshot](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/bCxmmxKN/images/55afc2262d30663396abc9dbd216db77a53288e5.png)
### You can also craft a golden version of the overweight apple. When falling, this version deals more damage than an anvil.

![fourth garnish update screenshot](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/bCxmmxKN/images/5dbff6a36593889ccc20642058437f1ddf13a157.png)
### All overweight crops can now be planted in pots!

 ![fifth garnish update screenshot](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/bCxmmxKN/images/18aad6191d9c3a27f1b331426d53244c774ec3ad.png)
### Now even nether wart can grow into an overweight variant!

## üì¶Compatibility/frens :D 

![compat 1](https://i.imgur.com/25VHqui.png)
### Overweight Onion and Overweight Cabbage from Farmer's Delight!

![compat 2](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/bCxmmxKN/images/aaabb587e3d84fb05884654ea8d2211d5a95afe1.png)
### (new cabbage textures)

![compat 3](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/bCxmmxKN/images/025d8890f85819efa3ded8c8b96b4ce321e89630.png)
### Overweight Garlic, Overweight Mandrake and Overweight Bloodroot for the Bewitchment!
 
![compat 4](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/bCxmmxKN/images/12879f1c89c9a95a172cbad896aa879ad176734a.png)
### Overweight Ginger for Snowy Spirit!

![compat 5](https://cdn.modrinth.com/data/bCxmmxKN/images/97f95851928dc591fd6ed59aa02cbc2948b276c8.png)
### Overweight Kiwi from the Hedgehogs mod!



# üîß Team :

Main Programmer: Orcinus

Fabric Porter: MrSterner 

Additional Artists: Yappethosen, Firch
 

üìù Notes:

üß∞ Modpack Designers:
